message: Let's start with a fair (but slightly biased towards me) offer. Take it or we can negotiate further.
I'm starting with a more even split.  Let's see if you're willing to negotiate further.  We have to be smart with our money, as inflation is a factor!
I'm willing to compromise.  This offer gives you a decent amount and keeps us both moving forward.
Let's try a 40/60 split. We're both losing money with every round, so we need to be more reasonable. This is a fair offer, and it will help us avoid getting nothing at all.
